about_p1: SAQQI offer a Packaging Solutions as an innovative & eco-friendly packaging bag in cooperation with manufacturer in Brasil. SAQQI provides a comprehensive eco-friendly range of packaging bag products such as Design & Customisable Paper Bag, Non Woven Bag and many more eco-friendly bags
about_vision_p: To position SAQQI in the Eco-friendly Gifts and Premium industry with a significant reliability in products & services for the african market
about_mission_l1: To constantly provide quality eco-friendly packaging bag with prompt & reliable service
about_mission_l2: To constantly provide innovative and trendy packaging bag ideas to meet with current market demand
about_mission_l3: To constantly research and develop environmental friendly product marketing plans in parallel with market trend changes
